steps.step: Chop Celery and Onion into small pieces
Mix Tuna, Mayo, Onion and Celery in a bowl. Spread mixture over 4 slices of bread. Add a slice of American Cheese to each sandwich. Top sandwiches with other piece of bread

Optional - Spread Mayonnaise over the outward facing sides of bread on each sandwich. Place sandwich in a skillet over medium heat until bread is lightly browned. Flip sandwich over and brown other side
